entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
